title: WFPB.fit
summary: Website that aggregates data, research, and other information about the Whole Food, Plant-Based (WFPB) diet. ES6, React, Redux, Victory.js front-end with data from FDA nutrition API (processed in Python).

title: WFPB.fit Backend
summary: Payment processing backend for wfpb.fit. Made with Express.js, Stripe, and published on AWS Lambda via aws-serverless-express. This server processes submitted forms from the client site when someone makes a donation.

title: SWAPI in Rails (Brave Interview)
summary: Take-home project completed for an interview at Brave Browser. A Rails 5.2, Webpacker, and React website that fetches data from the SWAPI API and caches it in PostgreSQL.

title: JASIG 2
summary: In-progress Godot 3.0 SHMUP 2D game with high numbers of onscreen entities and proc-gen enemy generation.

title: Godot Lightning
summary: Lightning effect using procedurally generated 2D lines with randomized L-system generation.

title: Godot Guns
summary: Scaffolding to bootstrap guns and bullets in Godot 3.

title: Texture Progress of Subunits
summary: UI element for Godot 3 that allows creation of Progress Bars made out of individual subunits.

title: Assembler 2D
summary: Godot 3.0 plugin for snapping 2D shapes together

title: Birdu
summary: Hybrid 2D, Phaser.io (JS) game published to Google Play with Cordova.js

title: rePAWster
summary: RePAWster is a Reddit bot utilizing PRAW that reposts top rated pictures of dogs from active dog subreddits

title: JASIG
summary: SHMUP 2D game with custom-built game engine in Native Android Java

title: Fun Groups!
summary: This project was my first stab at Android programming. The purpose was to create a studying tool for Organic Chemistry functional groups

title: UACT
summary: Volunteer project creating a website for local theatre group to display upcoming plays. Utilized Rails 4

title: Crash Boom Bop
summary: Native Android game using Accelerometer to sense motions and reward points proportional to user's reaction time.

title: Blog
summary: This website, my personal blog. Developed with Middleman.

title: BonkToTheFinish
summary: Homepage of Nicole Huston, ultra-runner. This blog follows Nicole's journeys in her ultra-running career. Developed by James Lowrey, it's a static website made with Middleman
